article_title: 3M pushes back on Trump call to stop sending N95 masks to Canada - Toronto Sun
article_description: WASHINGTON   One of the biggest American manufacturers of protective medical gear went to bat for its Canadian customers Friday as it pushed back against a White House order to stop exporting
article_content: WASHINGTON   One of the biggest American manufacturers of protective medical gear went to bat for its Canadian customers Friday as it pushed back against a White House order to stop exporting its surgical grade face masks   mission critical armour in the war    5826 chars
